00018 SYSTEMTIME     Logger::mLogStartTime;
00019 std::wofstream Logger::mLogFile;
00020 
00022 const char * Logger::LOG_FILE = "fmi_pc_app.log";
00023 
00024 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 void Logger::logRawData
00031     (
00032     Packet * aPacket,
00033     bool     aIsTx
00034     )
00035 {
00036     ASSERT( mLogFile.is_open() );
00037     ASSERT( aPacket != NULL );
00038     ASSERT( aPacket->getRawSize() > 0 );
00039 
00040     const uint8 * frame     = aPacket->getRawBytes();
00041     uint32        frameSize = aPacket->getRawSize();
00042 
00043     SYSTEMTIME currentSystemTime;
00044     FILETIME   currentFileTime, startFileTime;
00045     ULARGE_INTEGER currentTimeUlarge, startTimeUlarge;
00046     GetLocalTime( &currentSystemTime );
00047     SystemTimeToFileTime( &currentSystemTime, &currentFileTime );
00048     SystemTimeToFileTime( &Logger::mLogStartTime, &startFileTime );
00049 
00050     currentTimeUlarge.HighPart = currentFileTime.dwHighDateTime;
00051     currentTimeUlarge.LowPart = currentFileTime.dwLowDateTime;
00052     startTimeUlarge.HighPart = startFileTime.dwHighDateTime;
00053     startTimeUlarge.LowPart = startFileTime.dwLowDateTime;
00054 
00055     ULONGLONG elapsedMs;
00056     // currentTimeUlarge and startTimeUlarge are in 100 nanosecond intervals
00057     // there are 10 000 of these intervals in 1 ms.
00058     elapsedMs = ( currentTimeUlarge.QuadPart - startTimeUlarge.QuadPart ) / 10000;
00059 
00060     // Log viewer makes the following assumption
00061     ASSERT( elapsedMs < max_uint_val( uint32 ) );
00062 
00063     if( aIsTx )
00064         mLogFile << 'T';
00065     else
00066         mLogFile << 'R';
00067     mLogFile << elapsedMs << '-' << std::hex;
00068     for( uint32 i = 0; i < frameSize; i++ )
00069     {
00070         mLogFile << std::setw( 2 ) << frame[i];
00071     }
00072     mLogFile << std::endl << std::dec;
00073     mLogFile.flush();
00074     Event::post( EVENT_LOG_PACKET );
00075 }
00076 
00077 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 void Logger::clearLog()
00084 {
00085     if( mLogFile.is_open() )
00086         mLogFile.close();
00087 
00088     mLogFile.open( LOG_FILE, std::ios_base::out );
00089     mLogFile.fill('0');
00090     GetLocalTime( &mLogStartTime );
00091     mLogFile << mLogStartTime.wHour << ','
00092         << mLogStartTime.wMinute << ','
00093         << mLogStartTime.wSecond << ','
00094         << mLogStartTime.wMilliseconds
00095         << std::endl;
00096     Event::post( EVENT_LOG_PACKET );
00097 }
00098 
00099 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 void Logger::closeLog()
00103 {
00104     if( mLogFile.is_open() )
00105         mLogFile.close();
00106 }
00107 
00108 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 bool Logger::isLogOpen()
00112 {
00113     return mLogFile.is_open();
00114 }
